org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.parameters.collections

Class SlotMapParameterCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.api.parameters.JIPipeDynamicParameterCollection
      • org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.parameters.collections.SlotMapParameterCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JIPipeValidatable, JIPipeCustomParameterCollection, JIPipeParameterCollection, JsonDeserializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputSlotMapParameterCollection, OutputSlotMapParameterCollection

    public abstract class SlotMapParameterCollection
extends JIPipeDynamicParameterCollection
    Parameter that holds a value for each data slot

      • SlotMapParameterCollection

        public SlotMapParameterCollection(Class<?> dataClass,
                                  JIPipeGraphNode algorithm,
                                  Supplier<Object> newInstanceGenerator,
                                  boolean initialize)
        Creates a new instance
        Parameters:
        dataClass - the data type of the parameter assigned to each slot
        algorithm - the algorithm that contains the slots
        newInstanceGenerator - optional method that generated new instances. Can be null
        initialize - If true, update the slots on creation
